Package model.rooms

Class Room

java.lang.Object
model.rooms.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Room extends Object implements Serializable
The purpose of this class is to store the information about the room and about the time intervals when the room is booked
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

      public Room(String name, int capacity, String mergeWith)
      The purpose of this constructor is to initialize all the instance variable of the class
      Parameters:
      capacity - capacity of the room
      mergeWith - the room it can merge with
      name - room name

    • Room

      public Room(String name, int capacity)
      The purpose of this constructor is to initialize all the instance variable of the class except the merge with in case of adding a room which can not be merged
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the room
      capacity - the capacity of the room

  • Method Details

    • Book

      public void Book(BookingTime time)
      The purpose of this method is to book a room at a given time interval only if the room is free during that time
      Parameters:
      time - the time when the room is booked

    • canBeBookedAt

      public boolean canBeBookedAt(BookingTime time)
      The purpose of this method is to check if a room is free during a given time interval
      Returns:
      true if the room is free, false otherwise

    • unBook

      public void unBook(BookingTime time)
      The purpose of this method is to un-book a room at a given time interval in order to cancel the reservation so that it can be booked again by someone else
      Parameters:
      time - the time when room is booked

    • getIntervals

      public ArrayList<BookingTime> getIntervals()
      Returns:
      a list of all the intervals when the room is booked

    • roomData

      public String roomData()
      Returns:
      all the information about a room

      The purpose of this method is to appoint a booking time intervals to a room
